AzureBlobSasConfiguration.description: Specifies the shared access signature (SAS) that DataSync uses to access your Azure Blob Storage container.

AzureBlobSasToken.description: Specifies the shared access signature (SAS) token, which indicates the permissions DataSync needs to access your Azure Blob Storage container.
AzureBlobSasToken.markdownDescription:
Specifies the shared access signature (SAS) token, which indicates the permissions DataSync needs to access your Azure Blob Storage container.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 255  
Pattern: (^.+$)  
Update requires: No interruption

AzureBlobSasConfiguration.markdownDescription:
Specifies the shared access signature (SAS) that DataSync uses to access your Azure Blob Storage container.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key for an AWS resource tag.
Key.markdownDescription:
The key for an AWS resource tag.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9\s+=._:/-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The value for an AWS resource tag.
Value.markdownDescription:
The value for an AWS resource tag.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9\s+=._:@/-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

AgentArns.description: The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of agents to use for an Azure Blob Location.

items.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws|aws-cn|aws-us-gov|aws-iso|aws-iso-b):datasync:[a-z\-0-9]+:[0-9]{12}:agent/agent-[0-9a-z]{17}$  
Update requires: No interruption

AgentArns.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of agents to use for an Azure Blob Location.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

AzureBlobAuthenticationType.description: The specific authentication type that you want DataSync to use to access your Azure Blob Container.
AzureBlobAuthenticationType.markdownDescription:
The specific authentication type that you want DataSync to use to access your Azure Blob Container.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: SAS  
Update requires: No interruption

AzureBlobContainerUrl.description: The URL of the Azure Blob container that was described.
AzureBlobContainerUrl.markdownDescription:
The URL of the Azure Blob container that was described.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 325  
Pattern: ^https://[A-Za-z0-9]((.|-+)?[A-Za-z0-9]){0,252}/[a-z0-9](-?[a-z0-9]){2,62}$  
Update requires: Replacement

AzureBlobType.description: Specifies a blob type for the objects you're transferring into your Azure Blob Storage container.
AzureBlobType.markdownDescription:
Specifies a blob type for the objects you're transferring into your Azure Blob Storage container.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: BLOCK  
Update requires: No interruption

AzureAccessTier.description: Specifies an access tier for the objects you're transferring into your Azure Blob Storage container.
AzureAccessTier.markdownDescription:
Specifies an access tier for the objects you're transferring into your Azure Blob Storage container.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: HOT | COOL | ARCHIVE  
Update requires: No interruption

Subdirectory.description: The subdirectory in the Azure Blob Container that is used to read data from the Azure Blob Source Location.
Subdirectory.markdownDescription:
The subdirectory in the Azure Blob Container that is used to read data from the Azure Blob Source Location.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 1024  
Pattern: ^[\p{L}\p{M}\p{Z}\p{S}\p{N}\p{P}\p{C}]*$  
Update requires: No interruption

Tags.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.
Tags.markdownDescription:
An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

LocationArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Azure Blob Location that is created.
LocationArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Azure Blob Location that is created.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws|aws-cn|aws-us-gov|aws-iso|aws-iso-b):datasync:[a-z\-0-9]+:[0-9]{12}:location/loc-[0-9a-z]{17}$  
Update requires: No interruption

LocationUri.description: The URL of the Azure Blob Location that was described.
LocationUri.markdownDescription:
The URL of the Azure Blob Location that was described.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 4356  
Pattern: ^(azure-blob)://[a-zA-Z0-9./\-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption
